short_summary: Parks Canada Agency has a requirement for the supply and delivery of firewood on an as and when needed basis
description: Parks Canada Agency has a requirement for the supply and delivery of firewood on an reference_id
full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer - Supply and Delivery of Firewood
===============================================
### Request Number and Tender Status
----------------------------------------

 Request Number: WS4343768223-Doc4344914364

Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

### Important Dates
--------------------

*   Publication Date: 2023-12-13
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-10, at 14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2024-01-05
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-19
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2025-02-01

### Tender Description
-------------------------

 Parks Canada Agency (PCA) requires the supply and delivery of firewood to seven (7) campgrounds and one (1) woodlot in Jasper National Park (Alberta) on an as-needed basis. A Standing Offer will be awarded for a fixed term from 2024-04-01 to 2025-03-31, with four (4) one-year option periods extending the contract to 2029-03-31.

### Tender Process
-------------------

*   This is an open tendering process using Notice-Type Request for Standing Offer.
*   Bids shall be evaluated based on the lowest price.
*   The sources of supply will be from Canada.

### Contacts Information
-------------------------

*   Contracting Entity: PSPC
*   Contracting Entity's Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
*   Contact Person: Douglas Rachinski 
*   Contact Person's Email: [douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Related Documents
-------------------------

More information about this solicitation can be found at: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18272708?extsite=MTgyNzI3MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18272708?extsite=MTgyNzI3MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) 

### Miscellaneous
------------------
